document_data.caption: A map showing the River Agis north of the Calim Desert.
document_data.name: River Agis
document_data.mainbody:
The '''River Agis''' flowed from the east out of the [[Marching Mountains]] and into the [[Trackless Sea]] near the city of [[Memnon]].

It served as the border between [[Calimshan]] and [[Tethyr]] ever since the [[Eye Tyrant Wars]].
document_data.Description: The river was wide and slow-moving and very suitable for cargo-carrying barges and lumber.<ref name=EotSS-p88/> However, it did not receive as much traffic as would be expected owing to fears regarding [[Shoonach]],
document_data.History: The river became the border between Tethyr and Calimshan in the {{YearlinkName|-150}}, when the [[syl-pasha]] of [[Calimport]], [[Kamus el Tarshaj]], ceded the lands of [[Monrativi Teshy Mir]] over to Tethyrâ€”supposedly as a reward for Tethyr's assistance in the Eye Tyrant Wars more than a decade earlier.
